messages.message: You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
messages.author: A.A. Milne

messages.message: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
messages.author: Theodore Roosevelt

messages.message: You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.
messages.author: Sharon Salzberg

messages.message: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
messages.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

messages.message: To love oneself is the beginning of a lifelong romance.
messages.author: Oscar Wilde

messages.message: It always seems impossible until it's done.
messages.author: Nelson Mandela

messages.message: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
messages.author: Oscar Wilde

messages.message: You are enough just as you are.
messages.author: Meghan Markle

messages.message: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
messages.author: Arthur Ashe

messages.message: Don’t wait. The time will never be just right.
messages.author: Napoleon Hill

messages.message: Self-love is not selfish; you cannot truly love another until you know how to love yourself.
messages.author: Unknown

messages.message: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
messages.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

messages.message: With confidence, you have won before you have started.
messages.author: Marcus Garvey

messages.message: Your present circumstances don't determine where you can go; they merely determine where you start.
messages.author: Nido Qubein

messages.message: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
messages.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

messages.message: You are more powerful than you know; you are beautiful just as you are.
messages.author: Melissa Etheridge

messages.message: Self-care is how you take your power back.
messages.author: Lalah Delia

messages.message: If you want to fly, give up everything that weighs you down.
messages.author: Toni Morrison

messages.message: You don’t have to be perfect to be amazing.
messages.author: Unknown

messages.message: Happiness is an inside job.
messages.author: William Arthur Ward

messages.message: Confidence comes not from always being right but from not fearing to be wrong.
messages.author: Peter T. McIntyre

messages.message: How you love yourself is how you teach others to love you.
messages.author: Rupi Kaur

messages.message: Talk to yourself like you would to someone you love.
messages.author: Brené Brown

messages.message: Your worth is not measured by your productivity.
messages.author: Unknown

messages.message: You are allowed to be both a masterpiece and a work in progress simultaneously.
messages.author: Sophia Bush

messages.message: Let go of who you think you're supposed to be; embrace who you are.
messages.author: Brené Brown

messages.message: You owe yourself the love that you so freely give to other people.
messages.author: Unknown

messages.message: Your potential is endless.
messages.author: Unknown

messages.message: It's not selfish to love yourself, take care of yourself, and to make your happiness a priority.
messages.author: Mandy Hale

messages.message: Celebrate every tiny victory.
messages.author: Unknown

messages.message: You are capable of amazing things.
messages.author: Unknown

messages.message: Progress, not perfection.
messages.author: Unknown
